content: around* twice cut yarn and pull through remaining sts weave in ends knit another mitten notes a ribbing may be used for the cuff instead of a rolled top or a rolled top with no ribbing do your own thing have fun you can easily use this pattern for fingerless mitts just stop knitting and do a bit of ribbing try different weight yarns with the different stitch counts a bulky yarn at 48 stitches will produce a large mitten where as 32 stitches with sport yarn would fit a child this is a forgiving pattern that makes awesome good-ole plain vanilla mittens have fun and experiment © karen hoyle 2018
